The Blu-ray does include both DD-5.1 and DTS-HD High Res Audio. The description says Dolby Digital 5.1 and Dolby Digital Stereo Commentary.  I would bet that the source info is a typo, but I guess we'll have to download it to find out.

Mediainfo says its Dolby AC-3 5.1 @640 kbps.  I checked the file with barely 1% downloaded and with a .!ut file extension.  I don't know if this is accurate info.  I would think if Mediainfo could not read the actual file info, it would return no info at all.  I will update when the torrent is finished.
